title: Aldine
content:
In reference to the publishing house operated by Aldus Manutius (Italian _Manuzio_) in Venice between 1494 and 1515. Also types used by Manuzio and in most instances cut by [Francesco Griffo](http://web.archive.org/web/20141002102345/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Francesco%20Griffo) de Bologna.

Metal, digital and optical revivals resembling the types of Aldus and Griffo are sometimes known as Aldines.
author: James Arboghast
